title: Avengement (2019 Action) Revenge isn’t pretty. It’s savage. It’s Adkins.

sources.title: Avengement (2019 Action) Revenge isn’t pretty. It’s savage. It’s Adkins.
sources.description:
After years of assaults on him in prison, convicted felon Cain Burgess escapes for avengement on those responsible.


Original Title: Avengement

Director: Jesse V. Johnson
Writers: Jesse V. Johnson, Stu Small

Main Cast:
Scott Adkins - Cain Burgess 
Craig Fairbrass - Lincoln Burgess 
Thomas Turgoose - Tune 
Nick Moran - Hyde 
Kierston Wareing - Bez 
Louis Mandylor - Detective O’Hara

Genres: Action, Crime, Thriller
Release Date: May 24, 2019 
Filming Location:  London, UK


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics
